column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " " The darkest day in Fire Nation history .
#Text=" It 's got a date at the top , but it does n't say anything else . "
#Text=Aang says : " Sokka , where are you going ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " I want to know what happened to the Fire Nation on their darkest day .
#Text=" Katara says : " They destroyed everything having to do with the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's so unfair !
#Text=Just when I think I 'm one step ahead of the Fire Nation , it turns out they beat us here a long time ago .
#Text=I need to know what happened on the darkest day .
#Text=Hello , little weird fox guy .
#Text=" Zei says : " Seems it 's trying to assist you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Um , sure , I guess I 'll follow you .
#Text=" Zei says : " This room is a true marvel , a mechanical wonder .
#Text=It 's a planetarium that shows the heavens moving .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uh , this is beautiful , but how is it helpful ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe these dials represent dates and times .
#Text=Sokka , try entering that date from that parchment you took .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Shh , Katara , not in front of the fox , he 's with the owl .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wow , I got to hand it to you , Sokka .
#Text=You picked the best mini-vacation for sure .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , wait .
#Text=What happened to the sun ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Great , you must have broken it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's not broken .
#Text=The sun is behind the moon .
#Text=It 's a solar eclipse !
#Text=It 's literally the darkest day in Fire Nation history .
#Text=Now I get it .
#Text=Something awful happened on that day .
#Text=I do n't know what , but I do know why .
#Text=Firebenders lose their bending during a solar eclipse .
#Text=Sorry .
#Text=" Katara says : " That makes sense .
#Text=I mean , think what the lunar eclipse at the North Pole did to the waterbenders .
#Text=This is huge .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fine , you earned it .
#Text=We 've got ta get this information to the Earth King at Ba Sing Se .
#Text=We 'll wait for the next eclipse , then we 'll invade the Fire Nation when they 're totally helpless .
#Text=The Fire Lord is going down !
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Mortals are so predictable , and such terrible liars .
#Text=You betrayed my trust .
#Text=From the beginning , you intended to misuse this knowledge for evil purposes .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=If anyone 's evil , it 's the Fire Nation .
#Text=You saw what they did to your library .
#Text=They 're destructive and dangerous .
#Text=We need this information .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " You think you 're the first person to believe their war was justified ?
#Text=Countless others before you have come here seeking weapons or weaknesses or battle strategies .
#Text=" Aang says : " We had no choice .
#Text=Please , we 're just desperate to protect the people we love .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " And now I 'm going to protect what I love .
#Text=" Aang says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " I 'm taking my knowledge back .
#Text=No one will ever abuse it again .
#Text=" Katara says : " He 's sinking the building .
#Text=We 've got ta get out of here .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " I 'm afraid I ca n't allow that .
#Text=You already know too much .
#Text=" Toph says : " I already told you , I do n't wan na snuggle .
#Text=Library sinking .
#Text=Library sinking !
#Text=Hi - yah !
#Text=" Zei says : " Great Knowledge Spirit , I beg you , do not destroy your vast collection of priceless tomes .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 've got ta get back to the surface !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , let 's go .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But we still do n't know when the next eclipse is gon na to happen .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't be stupid !
#Text=We 'll find out later !
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , we wo n't .
#Text=If we leave this place , we 'll never get the information .
#Text=Aang , come with me to the planetarium , I need cover .
#Text=Katara , take Momo and get out of here !
#Text=" Katara says : " But ... !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Go !
#Text=" Katara says : " Hurry , Sokka !
#Text=" Toph says : " What is it now ?
#Text="
